ai-patthana8.23:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.23:0.3_0: consecrated with the fetters for oneself.
ai-patthana8.23:1.1_0: Not for the sake of another, or for the sake of both people, nor for the sake of veneration, or for the sake of sacrifice.
ai-patthana8.23:1.1_1: Not for the sake of another, or for the teaching, nor for the sake of both people.
ai-patthana8.23:1.1_2: Not for the sake of Kings don’t cling to the teaching, nor do they arise. And they don’t give rise to the causes of veneration.
ai-patthana8.23:2.1_0: Not for the sake of another, nor for the sake of perception, nor for the sake of sacrifice, or for the sake of both.
ai-patthana8.23:3.1_0: Not for the sake of Kings or those people, but not for the sake of veneration, or for the sake of sacrifice.
ai-patthana8.23:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
